@marsty5 I don't see why feedback can't be useful whenever you feel receptive to it. I think that I sought feedback after gigs which felt "good" to me. And probably received feedback at gigs which did not. :) I bet you feel your rhythm or style emerging waaaay before 100. Just enjoy!
